mapper.sql: ID, AD_CLIENT_ID, AD_ORG_ID, ISACTIVE, CREATIONDATE, OWNERID, MODIFIEDDATE, MODIFIERID, C_UOM_ID, NAME, VALUE, M_SIZEGROUP_ID, M_ATTRIBUTESET_ID, IMAGEURL, M_DIM1_ID, M_DIM2_ID, M_DIM3_ID, M_DIM4_ID, M_DIM5_ID, M_DIM6_ID, M_DIM7_ID, M_DIM8_ID, M_DIM9_ID, M_DIM10_ID, SERIALNO, PROAREA, BATCHNO, FLOWNO, UNIT, DOCUMENTNOTE, PRECOST, PRICELIST, HELP, DESCRIPTION, DESCRIPTIONURL, VERSIONNO, M_DIM11_ID, M_DIM12_ID, ISFAIRPRO, M_DIM13_ID, M_DIM14_ID, M_DIM15_ID, FAIRPDTTYPE, COLORS, SIZES, INTSCODE, STATUSTIME, STATUSERID, AU_PI_ID, AU_STATE, M_DIM16_ID, M_DIM17_ID, M_DIM18_ID, M_DIM19_ID, M_DIM20_ID, ADDSDESC, SHORTNAME, STEPCODE, DATASOURCE, FABCODE, FABELEMENT, WEIGHT, GENERATED, STATUS, PROTYPE, MAINFABREMARK, WITHFABREMARK, Y_FACTORY_ID, FABDATE, CLOTHDATE, OTCDATE, STYLEDESCRIPTION, BADICON, CRAFTWORKIMG, PACKSTYLE, TAILORNOTICE, METRICIMG, CRAFTWORKIMGTWO, BATHMODE, Y_STYLE_BOM_ID, CRAFTWORKIMGTHREE, Y_PROOF_ID, CONFIRMCOMMENT, PRICELIST2, STANDARD, COMPOSITION, BATHAREA, QUALITY, Y_BATHMODE_ID1, Y_BATHMODE_ID2, Y_BATHMODE_ID3, Y_BATHMODE_ID4, Y_BATHMODE_ID5, Y_BATHMODE_ID6, Y_BATHMODE_ID7, SUGGESTMOQ, B_CODE_FORMAT_ID, BOX_QTY, C_SUPPLIER_ID, M_COLOR_ID, ACOST, PRICEDIS, PRICE_SUG, ORIGCOST, TRANSSTATUS, E_NAME, MARKETDATE, ISSPECIAL, CATEGORYMARK, CATALOGNO, DESCRIPTION2, CLOTHES, ISINTERNAL, PDT_PAIRUP, C_CURRENCY_ID, PRICEMEMBER, MATCHRULE, ISGIFT, VIRTUALNAME, LOWEST_DISCOUNT, M_DIM21_ID, ISAGT, AGTDATE, IMP_STAND, COLORSALIAS, Y_PRICE_ACTUAL, ISTEUSCLR, SELFWORK, PDT_TYPE, M_DIM_NEW1_ID, M_DIM_NEW2_ID, M_DIM_NEW3_ID, M_DIM_NEW4_ID, M_DIM_NEW5_ID, M_DIM_NEW6_ID, M_DIM_NEW7_ID, M_DIM_NEW8_ID, M_DIM_NEW9_ID, M_DIM_NEW10_ID, M_DIM_NEW11_ID, M_DIM_NEW12_ID, M_DIM_NEW13_ID, M_DIM_NEW14_ID, M_DIM_NEW15_ID, M_DIM_NEW16_ID, M_DIM_NEW17_ID, M_DIM_NEW18_ID, M_DIM_NEW19_ID, M_DIM_NEW20_ID, M_DIM_NEW21_ID, M_DIM_NEW22_ID, M_DIM_NEW23_ID, M_DIM_NEW24_ID, M_DIM_NEW25_ID, M_DIM_NEW26_ID, M_DIM_NEW27_ID, M_DIM_NEW28_ID, M_DIM_NEW29_ID, M_DIM_NEW30_ID, M_DIM_NEW31_ID, M_DIM_NEW32_ID, M_DIM_NEW33_ID, M_DIM_NEW34_ID, M_DIM_NEW35_ID, M_DIM_NEW36_ID, M_DIM_NEW37_ID, M_DIM_NEW38_ID, M_DIM_NEW39_ID, M_DIM_NEW40_ID, M_DIM_NEW41_ID, XW_VALUE, YC_VALUE, JK_VALUE, XC_VALUE, LBCC_VALUE, XBCC_VALUE, XKCC_VALUE, DK_VALUE, DKSL_VALUE, HZXC_VALUE, DC1_VALUE, DC_VALUE, MJK_VALUE, MJC_VALUE, IS_RETAIL, NOTLIMITDIS, IS_MSCODE, COLORARR_DES, DK_NUMBER, COLORARR, COLORVALUE, AMJ_VALUE, QTMJ_VALUE, HZXC1_VALUE, QTXK_VALUE, JZ_VALUE, QTXB_VALUE, TANGZ, HUAX, LXSX2_VALUE, LXSX1_VALUE, QTLB_VALUE, LXSX3_VALUE, LXSX4_VALUE, LXSX5_VALUE, LING_NUMBER2_VALUE, LING_NUMBER1_VALUE, LING_VALUE, QTXBZZ_VALUE, XBC_VALUE, LING_CC_VALUE, XBZZ_VALUE, QTJX_VALUE, QTXX_VALUE, XB_VALUE, SIZE_TYPE, PRICE, PRICE1, JL_PRICE, APPROVE_ID, RETAIL_PRICE, RETAIL_PRICE1, MPTBELONGTYPE, M_BASEMPTSIZE_ID, XWOLD_VALUE, YCOLD_VALUE, JKOLD_VALUE, XCOLD_VALUE, SHOWPIC, CZ_DATE, NO, CUSTOMER, DESCRIPTION3, DESCRIPTION5, DESCRIPTION4, DESCRIPTION6, DESCRIPTION7, C_CUSTOMER_ID1, M_DIM22_ID, TO_STOREID, ACTUALPRICE

SELECT decode(t2.code,null,1,2) as iscollect,t1.M_PRODUCT_ID AS mProductId, t1.name,t1.IMGURL1 AS imgUrl1,t1.modifieddate,nvl(t1.is_recommend,'N') as isRecommend FROM
(select t1.*,t2.sumQty from t1,v_query_product_rank t2 where t1.name = t2.PDT) t1 t1
LEFT JOIN (select * from m_product_collect t where t.isactive = 'Y' and t.code = #{code}) t2 on t1.M_PRODUCT_ID = t2.m_product_id WHERE 1=1
order by t1.sumQty desc,NVL(t1.ORDERNO,0) desc,t1.name asc

choose.when: (select t1.* from t1,v_query_product_rank t2 where t1.name = t2.PDT) t1
select count(1) from t1,v_query_product_rank t2 where t1.name = t2.PDT

mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.name, t1.DESCRIPTION3, t1.DESCRIPTION4, t1.DESCRIPTION5, (SELECT t2.ATTRIBNAME FROM M_DIM_NEW t2 WHERE t1.M_DIM_NEW11_ID = t2.id and t2.DIMFLAG='DIMFLAG_NEW11' and t2.ISACTIVE = 'Y') as mDimNew11Text, (SELECT t2.ATTRIBNAME FROM M_DIM_NEW t2 WHERE t1.M_DIM_NEW13_ID = t2.id and t2.DIMFLAG='DIMFLAG_NEW13' and t2.ISACTIVE = 'Y') as mDimNew13Text, t5.IMGURL1, t5.IMGURL2, t5.IMGURL3, t5.IMGURL4, t5.IMGURL5, t5.IMGURL6, t5.IMGURL7, t5.IMGURL8, t1.MPTBELONGTYPE, (select b.description from AD_LIMITVALUE_GROUP a,AD_LIMITVALUE b where a.ISACTIVE = 'Y' and b.ISACTIVE = 'Y' and a.name = 'MPTBELONGTYPE' and a.id = b.ad_limitvalue_group_id and b.value = t1.MPTBELONGTYPE) as mptbelongtypeText, t6.*, t1.gw from M_PRODUCT t1 LEFT JOIN B_PDT_MEDIA t5 on t1.id = t5.M_PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN (select a.M_PRODUCT_ID, a.CLR_RANGE AS clrRange, (SELECT t2.ATTRIBNAME FROM M_DIM_NEW t2 WHERE a.M_DIM_NEW14_ID = t2.id and t2.DIMFLAG='DIMFLAG_NEW14' and t2.ISACTIVE = 'Y') as mDimNew14Text, (SELECT t2.ATTRIBNAME FROM M_DIM_NEW t2 WHERE a.M_DIM_NEW16_ID = t2.id and t2.DIMFLAG='DIMFLAG_NEW16' and t2.ISACTIVE = 'Y') as mDimNew16Text, a.XW_VALUE as defaultXwValue, a.YC_VALUE as defaultYcValue, a.XC_VALUE as defaultXcValue FROM M_PRODUCT_DIM a WHERE a.isdefault = 'Y' and a.ISACTIVE = 'Y' and a.M_PRODUCT_ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) t6 on t1.id = t6.M_PRODUCT_ID WHERE t5.ISACTIVE = 'Y' and t1.ISACTIVE = 'Y' and t1.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select t.XW_VALUE as xwValue, t.YC_VALUE as ycValue, t.JK_VALUE as jkValue, t.XC_VALUE as xcValue from V_CUSMPTCATEITEM t where t.M_PRODUCT_ID = #{mProductId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT a.size_type AS sizeType, a.mptbelongtype, t.M_DIM_NEW13_ID AS mDimNew13Id, t.ct, t.c as ct1, t.M_DIM_NEW14_ID AS mDimNew14Id, t.M_DIM_NEW15_ID AS mDimNew15Id, t.M_DIM_NEW16_ID AS mDimNew16Id, t.M_DIM_NEW17_ID AS mDimNew17Id, t.M_DIM_NEW12_ID AS mDimNew12Id, t.M_DIM_NEW18_ID AS mDimNew18Id, t.M_DIM_NEW45_ID AS mDimNew45Id, t.XBC_VALUE AS xbcValue, t.M_DIM_NEW19_ID AS mDimNew19Id, t.M_DIM_NEW22_ID AS mDimNew22Id, t.M_DIM_NEW9_ID AS mDimNew9Id, t.M_DIM_NEW9_ID2 AS mDimNew9Id2, t.M_DIM_NEW9_ID3 AS mDimNew9Id3, t.QTX_REMARK AS qtxRemark, t.QTX_REMARK2 AS qtxRemark2, t.QTX_REMARK3 AS qtxRemark3, t.M_DIM_NEW26_ID AS mDimNew26Id, t.M_DIM_NEW28_ID AS mDimNew28Id, t.M_DIM_NEW25_ID AS mDimNew25Id, t.M_DIM_NEW10_ID AS mDimNew10Id, t.M_DIM_NEW32_ID AS mDimNew32Id, t.M_DIM_NEW41_ID AS mDimNew41Id, t.M_DIM_NEW46_ID AS mDimNew46Id, t.XB_REMARK AS xbRemark, t.M_DIM_NEW4_ID AS mDimNew4Id, t.M_DIM_NEW6_ID AS mDimNew6Id, t.M_DIM_NEW7_ID AS mDimNew7Id, t.M_DIM_NEW37_ID AS mDimNew37Id, t.M_DIM_NEW38_ID AS mDimNew38Id, t.M_DIM_NEW39_ID AS mDimNew39Id, t.M_DIM_NEW1_ID AS mDimNew1Id, t.M_DIM_NEW3_ID AS mDimNew3Id, t.LBCC_VALUE AS lbccValue, t.HX_SHOW AS hxShow, t.LB_REMARK AS lbqt, t.M_PRODUCT_ID2 AS lwqt, t.M_LBLX_SET_ID1 AS lbt, t.M_LBLX_SET_ID2 AS lxt, t.QTKD_REMARK AS qtkdRemark, t.QTFJ_REMARK AS qtfjRemark, t.QTTSGY_REMARK AS qttsgyRemark, t.DESCRIPTION AS lxRemark, t.JZ_VALUE AS jzValue, t.DKSL_VALUE AS dkslValue, t.MJK_VALUE AS mjkValue, t.DC1_VALUE AS dc1Value, t.HZXC_VALUE AS hzxcValue, t.MJC_VALUE AS mjcValue, t.XW_VALUE AS xwValue, t.TZ_SHOW AS tzShow, t.TZ_REMARK AS tzRemark, t.TZ_REMARK1 AS tzRemark1, t.TZ_REMARK2 AS tzRemark2, t.KD_SHOW AS kdShow, t.FJ_SHOW AS fjShow, t.TSGY_SHOW AS tsgyShow, t.XK_REMARK AS xkRemark, t.XXB_REMARK AS xxbRemark, t.DK_VALUE AS dkValue, t.YC_VALUE AS ycValue, t.JK_VALUE AS jkValue, t.XC_VALUE AS xcValue, t.XKCC_VALUE AS xkccValue, t.XBCC_VALUE AS xbccValue, t.CLR_RANGE AS clrRange, t.QTL_REMARK AS qtlRemark, (select nvl(max(g.attribname),'') from M_DIM_NEW g where g.id = t.M_DIM_NEW29_ID) as huax, t.MJZZ_REMARK AS mjzzRemark, GET_PZSJSON(1,a.id,t.M_DIM_NEW14_ID,t.M_DIM_NEW15_ID,t.M_DIM_NEW16_ID) AS pzJsonstr, GET_PZSJSON(2,a.id,t.M_DIM_NEW14_ID,t.M_DIM_NEW15_ID,t.M_DIM_NEW16_ID) AS zzJsonstr, GET_PZSJSON(3,a.id,t.M_DIM_NEW14_ID,t.M_DIM_NEW15_ID,t.M_DIM_NEW16_ID) AS zxJsonstr, GET_PZSJSON(4,a.id,t.M_DIM_NEW14_ID,t.M_DIM_NEW15_ID,t.M_DIM_NEW16_ID) AS zbJsonstr FROM M_PRODUCT_DIM t, M_PRODUCT a WHERE T.M_PRODUCT_ID = a.ID and a.ID = #{mProductId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND ROWNUM = 1 and t.isactive = 'Y' and ISDEFAULT = 'Y'

select b.NAME AS colorName, b.id AS colorId, b.value AS colorValue, nvl(b.DESCRIPTION,'') AS colorDesc from m_product_alias t, m_product a, m_color b, m_attributesetinstance c where t.m_product_id = a.ID and a.ID = #{mProductId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and t.m_attributesetinstance_id = c.id and c.value1_id = b.ID group by b.NAME, b.id, b.value, b.DESCRIPTION

SELECT t.m_dim_new14_id, a.NAME AS colorName, a.id AS colorId, a.value AS colorValue, nvl(a.DESCRIPTION,'') AS colorDesc FROM COLOR_MANAGE t, m_color a WHERE t.m_dim_new14_id = #{mDimNew14Id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND a.id = t.m_color_id and t.isactive = 'Y' order by a.NAME

SELECT t.m_dim_new14_id, (SELECT t2.ATTRIBNAME FROM M_DIM_NEW t2 WHERE t.M_DIM_NEW14_ID = t2.id and t2.DIMFLAG='DIMFLAG_NEW14' and t2.ISACTIVE = 'Y') as mDimNew14Text, t.m_color AS colorName FROM M_COLOR_2 t WHERE t.m_product_id = #{mProductId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and t.isactive = 'Y'

select b.NAME AS sizeName, b.id AS sizeId from m_product_alias t, m_product a, m_size b, m_attributesetinstance c where t.m_product_id = a.ID and a.ID = #{mProductId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and t.m_attributesetinstance_id = c.id and c.value2_id = b.ID group by b.NAME, b.id

SELECT (select '[' || WM_CONCAT('{''value'':''' || t.xw_value || ''' }') || ']' from B_CUSMPTCATEITEM t WHERE t.B_CUSMPTCATE_ID = a.id) as xwArray, (select '[' || WM_CONCAT('{''id'':''' || t.M_DIM_NEW25_ID || ''',''attribname'':'''||t1.attribname||''' }') || ']' from B_CUSMPTCATE_LX t,m_dim_new t1 WHERE t.M_DIM_NEW25_ID = t1.id and t.B_CUSMPTCATE_ID = a.id) as lxShow, (select '[' || WM_CONCAT('{''id'':''' || t.M_DIM_NEW18_ID || ''',''attribname'':'''||t1.attribname||''' }') || ']' from B_CUSMPTCATE_XF t,m_dim_new t1 WHERE t.M_DIM_NEW18_ID = t1.id and t.B_CUSMPTCATE_ID = a.id) as gjxfShow, (select '[' || WM_CONCAT('{''id'':''' || t.M_DIM_NEW10_ID || ''',''attribname'':'''||t1.attribname||''' }') || ']' from B_CUSMPTCATE_XB t,m_dim_new t1 WHERE t.M_DIM_NEW10_ID = t1.id and t.B_CUSMPTCATE_ID = a.id) as xbShow, (select '[' || WM_CONCAT('{''id'':''' || t.M_DIM_NEW32_ID || ''',''attribname'':'''||t1.attribname||''' }') || ']' from B_CUSMPTCATE_XK t,m_dim_new t1 WHERE t.M_DIM_NEW32_ID = t1.id and t.B_CUSMPTCATE_ID = a.id) as xkShow, (select '[' || WM_CONCAT('{''id'':''' || t.M_DIM_NEW7_ID || ''',''attribname'':'''||t1.attribname||''' }') || ']' from B_CUSMPTCATE_MJZZ t,m_dim_new t1 WHERE t.M_DIM_NEW7_ID = t1.id and t.B_CUSMPTCATE_ID = a.id) as mjzzShow, (select '[' || WM_CONCAT('{''id'':''' || t.M_DIM_NEW26_ID || ''',''attribname'':'''||t1.attribname||''' }') || ']' from B_CUSMPTCATE_LB t,m_dim_new t1 WHERE t.M_DIM_NEW26_ID = t1.id and t.B_CUSMPTCATE_ID = a.id) as lbShow, (select '[' || WM_CONCAT('{''id'':''' || t.M_DIM_NEW22_ID || ''',''attribname'':'''||t1.attribname||''' }') || ']' from B_CUSMPTCATE_JX t,m_dim_new t1 WHERE t.M_DIM_NEW22_ID = t1.id and t.B_CUSMPTCATE_ID = a.id) as jxShow, (select '[' || WM_CONCAT('{''id'':''' || t.M_DIM_NEW12_ID || ''',''attribname'':'''||t1.attribname||''' }') || ']' from B_CUSMPTCATE_SY t,m_dim_new t1 WHERE t.M_DIM_NEW12_ID = t1.id and t.B_CUSMPTCATE_ID = a.id) as syShow, (select '[' || WM_CONCAT('{''id'':''' || t.M_DIM_NEW9_ID || ''',''attribname'':'''||t1.attribname||''' }') || ']' from B_CUSMPTCATE_XX t,m_dim_new t1 WHERE t.M_DIM_NEW9_ID = t1.id and t.B_CUSMPTCATE_ID = a.id) as xxShow, a.IS_YCAFFIX AS isYcAffix, a.IS_JKAFFIX AS isJkAffix, a.IS_XCAFFIX AS isXcAffix, a.IS_HXAFFIX AS isHxAffix FROM B_CUSMPTCATE a WHERE a.M_PRODUCT_ID = #{mProductId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT a.value1_code as value1Code, d.VALUE, a.value1,a.value1_id as colorId,d.id as sizeId FROM m_attributesetinstance a, m_product_alias b,m_product c,m_size d WHERE c.name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.id = b.m_attributesetinstance_id AND b.m_product_id=c.id and c.m_sizegroup_id=d.M_ATTRIBUTE_ID and a.value2_id=d.ID and d.id not in (1371,1372) and b.id not in(38970,35276) order by d.MARTIXCOL
